additionRate: Desired addition rate of Crème of Tartar (mg/L)
info: Crème of tartar (potassium bitartrate) is used for cold stabilization of wine. IMPORTANT NOTES: • Adjust FSO2 before cold stabilising • Only add when temp < 0°C • Circulate tank for minimum of four hours after any addition • Aim to keep pH < 3.65 • Filter at seeding temperature once cold stable • Verify cold stability post addition

formula.description: Formula for crème of tartar addition calculation
